thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Onconova Therapeutics Reports Full-Year 2017 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Onconova Therapeutics Reports Full-Year 2017 Results
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Onconova Therapeutics Inc:
* ONCONOVA THERAPEUTICS, INC. REPORTS BUSINESS HIGHLIGHTS AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* ONCONOVA THERAPEUTICS INC - CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, TOTALED $4.0 MILLION, COMPARED TO $21.4 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016
* ONCONOVA THERAPEUTICS - EXPECTS CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO FUND ONGOING TRIALS AND OPERATIONS INTO Q3 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
